reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 388/05: TERM DEBENTURES AUTHORIZED UNDER SECTION 452 OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: TERM DEBENTURES AUTHORIZED UNDER SECTION 452 OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act, 2001   Loi de 2001 sur les municipalités

content.content: 1. (1) A regional municipality is authorized to exercise the powers that it had under subsections 116 (47) to (49) of the Regional Municipalities Act on December 31, 2002 to issue term debentures. O. Reg. 388/05, s. 1 (1). (2) In any by-law or document relating to the issuance of a term debenture authorized by subsection (1), a reference to a retirement fund debenture shall be read as if it were a reference to a term debenture. O. Reg. 388/05, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) A regional municipality is authorized to exercise the powers that it had under subsections 116 (47) to (49) of the Regional Municipalities Act on December 31, 2002 to issue term debentures. O. Reg. 388/05, s. 1 (1).

(2) In any by-law or document relating to the issuance of a term debenture authorized by subsection (1), a reference to a retirement fund debenture shall be read as if it were a reference to a term debenture. O. Reg. 388/05, s. 1 (2).

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 388/05, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 388/05, s. 2.
